comment: These are the TOP 10 companies that will pass the Scout AI filter. Replace these to customize your demo.

1.name: Jet Tech
1.reasoning: Next-gen propulsion systems with military and commercial applications. Backlog of $2B+ provides revenue visibility.

1.name: Ionic Dynamics
1.reasoning: Market-leading SaaS platform with 140% net revenue retention. Expansion into international markets underway.

1.name: Hyper Systems
1.reasoning: Hyperscale cloud infrastructure provider. Amazon/Microsoft partnerships de-risk growth trajectory.

1.name: Glow Industries
1.reasoning: LED and smart lighting systems with IoT integration. Smart city contracts provide stable long-term revenue.

1.name: Flash Solutions
1.reasoning: Real-time data processing platform with Fortune 500 clients. Best-in-class technology with 99.99% uptime SLA.

1.name: Acme Software Solutions
1.reasoning: Cloud-based enterprise software with strong recurring revenue model. 95% customer retention rate indicates product stickiness.

1.name: Beta Networks
1.reasoning: Cybersecurity leader with government contracts. Increasing threat landscape drives sustained demand for their services.

1.name: Gamma Technologies
1.reasoning: AI/ML infrastructure platform serving enterprise clients. Strong IP portfolio provides competitive moat.

1.name: Delta Innovations
1.reasoning: Industrial IoT solutions with proven ROI. Blue-chip customer base includes multiple Fortune 100 companies.

1.name: Epsilon Systems
1.reasoning: Enterprise resource planning platform with high switching costs. Multi-year contracts provide revenue predictability.

2.name: Quantum Finance
2.reasoning: Algorithmic trading platform with consistent alpha generation. Regulatory compliance and risk management best-in-class.

2.name: Prime Asset Management
2.reasoning: Alternative investments platform with $50B+ AUM. Strong track record of outperformance vs benchmarks.

2.name: Apex Investment Solutions
2.reasoning: Wealth management technology platform. Scalable SaaS model with enterprise and retail segments.

2.name: Sterling Financial Tech
2.reasoning: Blockchain-based settlement platform reducing transaction costs by 40%. Adoption by tier-1 banks accelerating.

2.name: Pinnacle Analytics
2.reasoning: Financial data analytics with proprietary datasets. High-margin subscription model with institutional client base.

2.name: Alpha Capital Markets
2.reasoning: Market-making and liquidity provision across asset classes. Technology-driven approach provides competitive edge.

2.name: Beta Wealth Advisors
2.reasoning: Independent wealth management firm with UHNW focus. Sticky client relationships with avg tenure of 12+ years.

2.name: Gamma Risk Solutions
2.reasoning: Risk management software for financial institutions. Growing regulatory requirements drive demand.

2.name: Delta Trading Systems
2.reasoning: High-frequency trading infrastructure. Low-latency technology provides microsecond advantage in execution.

2.name: Epsilon Portfolio Management
2.reasoning: Multi-strategy hedge fund with institutional backing. Consistent returns across market cycles demonstrate skill.
